entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Showers in the Natuashish area this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
